info.description: Comprehensive API collection for the Ride-Hailing platform
info.name: Ride-Hailing API

request.description: Register a new user (rider or driver)
Login and receive JWT token. Token is auto-saved to auth_token environment variable.
List rides for the authenticated user
Get details of a specific ride
Get surge pricing information for a location
Find matching drivers near a location
Get receipt for a completed ride
Get ride types available at a location. Uses cascading resolution: city-level > country-level > global fallback.
Get detailed information about a past ride
Get receipt for a past ride
Get detailed information about a driver's past ride
Get receipt for a driver's past ride
Get cancellation details for a ride
Get cancellation stats for a specific user (admin)
Send a tip to a driver
Get suggested tip amounts based on fare
Rate a driver after a ride
Get ratings for a specific user
Get chat messages for a ride
Track a delivery by code (no auth required)
Get transactions for a gift card
Pay your share of a split
Get split details for a ride
Get exchange rate between two currencies
Get surge pricing for a location
Get pricing configuration for a location

Get fare estimates for all available ride types in a single API call. Returns distance, estimated time, and pricing for each ride type. This endpoint solves the N+1 query problem - instead of calling /estimate multiple times (once per ride type), the mobile app can call this once to get all ride types with their fares.
Admin: list vehicles with expiring documents

body.raw:
{
  "category": "payment",
  "subject": "Overcharged for ride",
  "description": "I was charged more than the estimated fare",
  "ride_id": "{{ride_id}}",
  "priority": "high"
}

request.description: Get messages for a support ticket
Add a comment to a dispute
Admin: add a comment to a dispute
Get fraud alerts for a user
Add a member to family group
Get ride preferences for a specific ride
Get rider preferences for a ride (driver view)
Add an employee to corporate account
Remove an employee from corporate account
Send a notification to a user
Send ride requested notification to driver
Send ride accepted notification to rider
Admin: create flag override for user
Get top drivers with full details
Get chat history for a ride
Get driver location via realtime service
